summary: THE TRANSMISSION DID NOT SHIFT INTO GEAR. IT FELT AS IF THE GEAR WAS  IN NEUTRAL, CONSUMER WAS INFORMED  THAT WATER AND TRANSMISSION FLUID CAME OUT OF THE TRANSMISSION BREATHER WHICH CAUSED THE FLUID TO TURN PINK, AND THE TRANSMISSION NEEDED TO BE REPLACED.  ALSO THE ENGINE STALLED ON OCCASIONS.  *AK   *JB
